short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web2Text converts web pages to plain text with a click, for distraction-free reading and easy text extraction, enhancing browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web2Text is a Chrome extension that simplifies web content by converting entire web pages into plain text format with a single click. Enjoy distraction-free reading and easy text extraction from any webpage, enhancing your browsing experience.
